profile:
Visit www.FortRepairs.ca for further details on Fort Appliance Repair!

You can depend on us to get your appliance back up and running as quickly as possible so you can get back to living comfortably. All while providing professional service to ensure the problem is fixed and helping you understand what has happened and why it happened. 

Our parts are sourced out of the largest parts distribution centers in the country with express shipping. That means no outrageously long wait times just to get the parts we need; that is if we can't get it fixed the first visit!

We service any brand of all major kitchen appliances as well as laundry for residential homes.
name: Fort Appliance Repair Inc.

profile:
We are Fort McMurray's #1 choice when it comes to speedy and quality appliance repair and appliance services.  From washers and dryers to refrigerators and ovens we can take care of it all.  Don't wait around for bad service and poor quality repair jobs, calls us today and get the job done right the first time!
Our friendly and helpful customer service representatives would love to speak to you on the phone and help you schedule in an inspection or repair for any home appliance.  The process is easy and done in less than one minute!  With the best prices in town we're impossible to beat.
Call today and we'll see you soon.
